item.title: Dangerous speeding on Chipperfield road, 2nd January
item.description:

item.title: Danger to public - road and walking pavement blocked by waste, 2nd January
item.description:
At the beginning of Defoe Close on the corner of Vaughan Street, there is building material wastes (on side of 1 Vaughan Street in Defoe Close) and cut down trees and the rear of 339 and 335 Rotherhite Street (on Defoe Close. It needs to be urgently cleared because it is blocking the walkway and road, and can harm people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Defoe Close, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hmo still dumping rubbish, 2nd January
item.description:
61 Hearns Road is a HMO this is now the third time they have started dumping their rubbish in the street. Again we don't know the residents in this property as its a HMO. Please can these landlords be educated to advise their tenants that the pavement is not a dumping ground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Hearns Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
